flavor_text.1: Enables the user to perform first in the next turn.
flavor_text.2: Enables the user to perform last in the next turn.
flavor_text.4: Earn +2 if the Judge's Voltage goes up.
flavor_text.5: A basic performance using a move known by the Pokémon.
flavor_text.6: Earn +3 if no other Pokémon has chosen the same Judge.
flavor_text.7: Allows performance of the same move twice in a row.
flavor_text.8: Increased Voltage is added to the performance score.
flavor_text.9: Earn +15 if all the Pokémon choose the same Judge.
flavor_text.10: Lowers the Voltage of all Judges by one each.
flavor_text.11: Earn double the score in the next turn.
flavor_text.12: Steals the Voltage of the Pokémon that just went.
flavor_text.13: Prevents the Voltage from going up in the same turn.
flavor_text.14: Makes the order of contestants random in the next turn.
flavor_text.15: Earns double the score on the final performance.
flavor_text.16: Raises the score if the Voltage is low.
flavor_text.17: Earn +2 if the Pokémon performs first in the turn.
flavor_text.18: Earn +2 if the Pokémon performs last in the turn.
flavor_text.19: Prevents the Voltage from going down in the same turn.
flavor_text.20: Earn +3 if two Pokémon raise the Voltage in a row.
flavor_text.21: Earn a higher score the later the Pokémon performs.
flavor_text.22: Earn +3 if the Pokémon that just went hit max Voltage.
flavor_text.23: Earn +3 if the Pokémon gets the lowest score.
